name: chess 3D mobile edition
description: Hello! Welcome to my game. It’s like chess but it’s not. In this game, you are the white King, who can do anything like anything, hold a cat, break the T.V., hold the Black King, etc… This game is funny, if you loss a chess game, you can destroy anything in the game. This game is underdevelopment, this is a Beta Version. Game Version is 1.0.0
